General.Name: Jinling Hotel Corp Ltd
General.Description: Jinling Hotel Corporation, Ltd. operates hotels in China. The company offers catering, guest room, and other supporting services. It is also involved in hotel material trade, property management, house leasing businesses. In addition, the company research, develops, and sells tourism resource and food related businesses. Further, it is involved in distribution of wine, beverage, sugar, and other commodities. The company was founded in 1983 and is based in Nanjing, China.

1.Name: Mr. Sheng Xin  Zhang
1.Title: Deputy Gen. Mang. and Sec. of the Board of Directors
